# New Add-on Requests

## Policy

Thank you for your interest in FaserF's Home Assistant Add-ons!

**I do not accept requests for new add-ons.**

I only add add-ons to this repository that I personally use and maintain. This ensures that:

- ğŸ”§ **Quality**: Every add-on gets proper attention and maintenance
- ğŸ  **Real-world testing**: All add-ons are tested in my own Home Assistant environment
- â±ï¸ **Sustainability**: I can realistically maintain all add-ons long-term

I'm happy to consider enhancements that benefit users.

Found a bug? Please [report it](https://github.com/FaserF/hassio-addons/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml) so I can fix it!
